page.title: 04HOME LIFE
page.content: Our day starts when father rushes into the kitchen,in a suit,grabs at a piece of toast smothered in marmalade,collects the paper and his leather briefcase and is gone.He drives to work in his Sierra.Father {works in Birmingham}with computers. When father returns home about six o'clock the family would have a large meal together consisting of meat, potatoes, carrots, peas and followed by a sweet. After dinner the family watch "Are you being served" and "T.J. Hooker" until about nine o'clock when the children go to bed and read. On a typical saturday the children watch the Saturday T.V and cartoons. After that they might play on the{home {computer}that most families have. Or outside on{B.M.X's,rollerboots}and skateboards. Or play with pets.Lunch would probably be a snack.
